channel.title: Genshin Impact EN - info
channel.description: info feed of Genshin Impact in en

item.title: Character Teaser - "Kaedehara Kazuha: Moonlit Breeze" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The journey following his escape from Inazuma will be long and fraught with peril, something Kaedehara Kazuha is well aware of.
item.content:encoded:
The journey following his escape from Inazuma will be long and fraught with peril, something Kaedehara Kazuha is well aware of.

Read more on Character Teaser - "Kaedehara Kazuha: Moonlit Breeze" | Genshin Impact

item.title: "I am Kaedehara Kazuha, a wanderer who roams the land."
item.description: Today, let's get to know the Ronin from Inazuma — Kaedehara Kazuha! This young man's calm personality belies a razor sharp blade that has seen many battles. Who knows if it was the storms of life that smoothed out his rough edges, or if his natural restraint has kept his edge sheathed...
item.content:encoded:
Today, let's get to know the Ronin from Inazuma — Kaedehara Kazuha! This young man's calm personality belies a razor sharp blade that has seen many battles. Who knows if it was the storms of life that smoothed out his rough edges, or if his natural restraint has kept his edge sheathed...

Read more on "I am Kaedehara Kazuha, a wanderer who roams the land."

item.title: "Legend of the Vagabond Sword" Gameplay Details
item.description:
The gate to an unknown domain has opened, and within it await powerful, heretofore unseen foes.
Draw your sword and enact your legend with the fearless spirit of a wandering warrior!
item.content:encoded:
The gate to an unknown domain has opened, and within it await powerful, heretofore unseen foes. Draw your sword and enact your legend with the fearless spirit of a wandering warrior!

Read more on "Legend of the Vagabond Sword" Gameplay Details

item.title: The "Distant Voyage" Web Event Has Begun
item.description: The sound of a flute being played by a young boy drifts through the wind... "Distant Voyage" — the web event for Genshin Impact's new character, Kaedehara Kazuha, is out now.
item.content:encoded:
The sound of a flute being played by a young boy drifts through the wind... "Distant Voyage" — the web event for Genshin Impact's new character, Kaedehara Kazuha, is out now.

Read more on The "Distant Voyage" Web Event Has Begun

item.content:encoded:

item.description:
None

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Kaedehara Kazuha: Free Spirit" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The signs of a coming storm persuade some to seek shelter while urging others to press onward. It is with a sharp sword and clear mind, that one can truly be well prepared for the storm.
item.content:encoded:
The signs of a coming storm persuade some to seek shelter while urging others to press onward. It is with a sharp sword and clear mind, that one can truly be well prepared for the storm.

item.description: "There will always be those who dare to brave the lightning's glow."
item.content:encoded:
"There will always be those who dare to brave the lightning's glow."

item.title: "Never-Ending Battle" Gameplay Details
item.description: Enemies of unknown origin have come ashore the Golden Apple Archipelago, intent on taking this seaborne paradise for themselves. Use the mechanisms and the blessings from Momentum Discs to beat back the monsters in one fell swoop!
item.content:encoded:
Enemies of unknown origin have come ashore the Golden Apple Archipelago, intent on taking this seaborne paradise for themselves. Use the mechanisms and the blessings from Momentum Discs to beat back the monsters in one fell swoop!

Read more on "Never-Ending Battle" Gameplay Details

item.title: Version 2.0 "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" Trailer | Genshin Impact
item.description: A foreign thunderstorm tears the sky apart, splitting eternity. Flashes of lightning cut through the darkness, as a god's will manifests.
item.content:encoded:
A foreign thunderstorm tears the sky apart, splitting eternity. Flashes of lightning cut through the darkness, as a god's will manifests.

Read more on Version 2.0 "The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia" Trailer | Genshin Impact

item.title: Notice on Cross-Save Function Between Account for PSN and miHoYo Account
item.description: Greetings, dear Travelers.The cross-save function between account for PlayStation™Network and miHoYo Account is coming to you in Version 2.0. Here, we will answer your questions about the cross-save function from five aspects: account linking, top-ups, special rewards, Co-Op on PlayStation, and friends.
item.content:encoded:
Greetings, dear Travelers.The cross-save function between account for PlayStation™Network and miHoYo Account is coming to you in Version 2.0. Here, we will answer your questions about the cross-save function from five aspects: account linking, top-ups, special rewards, Co-Op on PlayStation, and friends.

Read more on Notice on Cross-Save Function Between Account for PSN and miHoYo Account

item.title: Weapon Wish Mechanic "Epitomized Path" Details
item.description: After the 2.0 update, a special wish mechanism will be added to the Weapon Wish —— Epitomized Path.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Inazuma Diaries Vol. 1: The Mysterious Electro Element
item.description: Our journey to Inazuma is about to begin. What lies in store in this land that is suffused with Electro? Let's find out!
item.content:encoded:
Our journey to Inazuma is about to begin. What lies in store in this land that is suffused with Electro? Let's find out!

item.title: Character Teaser - "Kamisato Ayaka: The Homeward Heron" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The Yashiro Commission is responsible for the sacred matters and cultural affairs of Inazuma. The Shirasagi Himegimi handles various official duties with dignified poise.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: "Master of Inazuma Kamisato Art Tachi Jutsu — Kamisato Ayaka, present!"
item.description: Today, we'd like to introduce to you the daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan — Kamisato Ayaka!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Inazuma Diaries Vol. 2 - Mechanisms and Wondrous Devices
item.description: In the course of exploring Inazuma, you will often come across some interesting devices. Faced with different mechanisms, how should we find a way to crack them? Let's take a look!
item.content:encoded:
In the course of exploring Inazuma, you will often come across some interesting devices. Faced with different mechanisms, how should we find a way to crack them? Let's take a look!

item.title: The Birth of a Dragon: A Behind the Scenes Look At the Creation of Azhdaha | Genshin Impact
item.description: Etched forever in stone, the mountains bear witness to his power. Of all the adversaries the Traveler has faced, Azhdaha has remained one of the most memorable. Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought this majestic creation to life!
item.content:encoded:
Etched forever in stone, the mountains bear witness to his power. Of all the adversaries the Traveler has faced, Azhdaha has remained one of the most memorable. Let's take a look at how the Genshin Impact team brought this majestic creation to life!

Read more on The Birth of a Dragon: A Behind the Scenes Look At the Creation of Azhdaha | Genshin Impact

item.title: Genshin Impact OST Album - The Shimmering Voyage
item.description: Genshin Impact's Version 1.0 Commemorative OST album "The Shimmering Voyage" is out now! The album's four discs "Fairytale of the Isles," "Blazing Stars," "Roar of the Formidable," and "A Stranger's Sojourn," feature 68 remarkable tracks composed by Yu-Peng Chen @HOYO-MiX and produced by the HOYO-MiX team, each one an original composition from Genshin Impact.
item.content:encoded:
Genshin Impact's Version 1.0 Commemorative OST album "The Shimmering Voyage" is out now! The album's four discs "Fairytale of the Isles," "Blazing Stars," "Roar of the Formidable," and "A Stranger's Sojourn," feature 68 remarkable tracks composed by Yu-Peng Chen @HOYO-MiX and produced by the HOYO-MiX team, each one an original composition from Genshin Impact.

Read more on Genshin Impact OST Album - The Shimmering Voyage

item.title: Character Demo - "Kamisato Ayaka: Camellia in Winter Snow" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Although Ayaka has long since mastered the Kamisato Art Tachi Jutsu, she continues to persevere in her practice. However, the servants have noticed that she is training much more than usual lately...
item.content:encoded:

item.title: "Fireworks are for now, but friends are forever" — "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya
item.description: Today, we'd like to introduce to you the pyrotechnician from Naganohara Fireworks — Yoimiya! She is the most skilled pyrotechnician in Inazuma and is known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival." In addition to being a craftsperson, she is also the "heroic sister" in the eyes of many children. No matter how big the problem is, Yoimiya always has a solution to save the day.
item.content:encoded:
Today, we'd like to introduce to you the pyrotechnician from Naganohara Fireworks — Yoimiya! She is the most skilled pyrotechnician in Inazuma and is known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival." In addition to being a craftsperson, she is also the "heroic sister" in the eyes of many children. No matter how big the problem is, Yoimiya always has a solution to save the day.

Read more on "Fireworks are for now, but friends are forever" — "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya

item.title: Character Teaser - "Yoimiya: The Queen of Summer on Narukami Island" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Visitors from afar come to Hanamizaka in hopes of finding "the best thing about summer on Narukami Island"... But they never realize that the figure gleaming like a golden spark was right in front of them all along.
item.content:encoded:
Visitors from afar come to Hanamizaka in hopes of finding "the best thing about summer on Narukami Island"... But they never realize that the figure gleaming like a golden spark was right in front of them all along.

item.title: "Seems like I could have just stayed in bed today." — "Mujina Ninja" Sayu
item.description: She has been raised in the Shuumatsuban since she was a child, and is extremely loyal to the organization. That said, her most prominent trait is not "loyalty", but "laziness."
item.content:encoded:
She has been raised in the Shuumatsuban since she was a child, and is extremely loyal to the organization. That said, her most prominent trait is not "loyalty", but "laziness."

item.title: Character Demo - "Yoimiya: Dazzling Lights in the Summer" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Those with a cheerful and childlike nature will surely feel very welcome at Yoimiya's Fireworks Show. The flame-clad girl raises her bow, sending brilliant fireworks into the clear night sky— "One, two, three! Welcome to the Fireworks Show!"
item.content:encoded:
Those with a cheerful and childlike nature will surely feel very welcome at Yoimiya's Fireworks Show. The flame-clad girl raises her bow, sending brilliant fireworks into the clear night sky— "One, two, three! Welcome to the Fireworks Show!"

Read more on Character Demo - "Yoimiya: Dazzling Lights in the Summer" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Yoimiya: Whispers of the Flames" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The fireworks that embody people's wishes are eternal like the moonlight and ever-rising like the sun. Just like the sparkles twinkling in the girl's eyes.
item.content:encoded:
The fireworks that embody people's wishes are eternal like the moonlight and ever-rising like the sun. Just like the sparkles twinkling in the girl's eyes.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Yoimiya: Whispers of the Flames" | Genshin Impact

item.title: "Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders" Gameplay Details
item.description: Thanks to the efforts of the Theater Mechanicus Representative Komakata, everyone's favorite game from Liyue is finally available in Inazuma. According to Komakata, in its latest iteration, the original gameplay of Theater Mechanicus has been expanded upon with more unique content...
item.content:encoded:
Thanks to the efforts of the Theater Mechanicus Representative Komakata, everyone's favorite game from Liyue is finally available in Inazuma. According to Komakata, in its latest iteration, the original gameplay of Theater Mechanicus has been expanded upon with more unique content...

Read more on "Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders" Gameplay Details

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Sayu: Whirling Windwheel" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Eating high-carb foods and doing work that uses the least energy is the principle that little ninja Sayu lives by.
item.content:encoded:
Eating high-carb foods and doing work that uses the least energy is the principle that little ninja Sayu lives by.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Sayu: Whirling Windwheel" | Genshin Impact

item.title: "Phantom Flow" Gameplay Details
item.description: The "Phantom Flow" Event is about to begin! Shousen, the master of Inazuma's Shinryuu, offers to help the Traveler initiate an imaginary, no-holds-barred fighting tournament, with a chance to win rewards for it.
item.content:encoded:
The "Phantom Flow" Event is about to begin! Shousen, the master of Inazuma's Shinryuu, offers to help the Traveler initiate an imaginary, no-holds-barred fighting tournament, with a chance to win rewards for it.

item.title: Version 2.1 "Floating World Under the Moonlight" Trailer | Genshin Impact
item.description: The people's wishes gathered under the bright moonlight, as they witnessed the power of lightning and fierce flames, and rejoiced in the smoke of hearths and the light of lanterns.
item.content:encoded:
The people's wishes gathered under the bright moonlight, as they witnessed the power of lightning and fierce flames, and rejoiced in the smoke of hearths and the light of lanterns.

item.title: Genshin Impact - Initial Top-Up Bonus Reset
item.description: After the Genshin Impact Version 2.1 update, each top-up level of Genesis Crystals in the Crystal Top-Up page will be reset to provide a double bonus for the first top-up.
item.content:encoded:
After the Genshin Impact Version 2.1 update, each top-up level of Genesis Crystals in the Crystal Top-Up page will be reset to provide a double bonus for the first top-up.

Read more on Genshin Impact - Initial Top-Up Bonus Reset

item.title: Realm of Tranquil Eternity：Inazuma Live Symphony Performance | Genshin Impact
item.description: This Inazuma Live Symphony Performance was filmed at the Tokyo Opera City Concert Hall. The performance features Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra, the oldest symphony orchestra in Japan, and Japan's top folk musicians performing Inazuma's regional pieces "Inazuma" and "Overlord of the Thunderstorm" together.
item.content:encoded:
This Inazuma Live Symphony Performance was filmed at the Tokyo Opera City Concert Hall. The performance features Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra, the oldest symphony orchestra in Japan, and Japan's top folk musicians performing Inazuma's regional pieces "Inazuma" and "Overlord of the Thunderstorm" together.

Read more on Realm of Tranquil Eternity：Inazuma Live Symphony Performance | Genshin Impact

item.description: Together with Maestro Dirk Brossé and the Flanders Symphony Orchestra, Genshin Impact is about to bring a wonderful musical journey, reliving the moving melodies that echo in Teyvat with Travelers.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: The Inazuma Diaries: Watatsumi Island & Seirai Island
item.description: In Version 2.1, two new islands will be introduced in Inazuma, Seirai Island and Watatsumi Island. They both have different customs, let's go and discover these mysterious places together!
item.content:encoded:
In Version 2.1, two new islands will be introduced in Inazuma, Seirai Island and Watatsumi Island. They both have different customs, let's go and discover these mysterious places together!

Read more on The Inazuma Diaries: Watatsumi Island & Seirai Island

item.title: Character Teaser - "Raiden Shogun: Nightmare" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Only the shadow of the days of yore and empty dreams remain. Meanwhile, the hearts of mortals weigh heavy with eternal loneliness. Such was the lingering image left in the "Plane of Euthymia" on the day of the Vision Hunt Ceremony.
item.content:encoded:
Only the shadow of the days of yore and empty dreams remain. Meanwhile, the hearts of mortals weigh heavy with eternal loneliness. Such was the lingering image left in the "Plane of Euthymia" on the day of the Vision Hunt Ceremony.

item.title: Character Demo - "Aloy: Otherworldly Hunter" | Genshin Impact
item.description: A skilled hunter is always on the prowl for new and thrilling experiences. Braving this strange new world of Teyvat will be Aloy's latest trial.
item.content:encoded:
A skilled hunter is always on the prowl for new and thrilling experiences. Braving this strange new world of Teyvat will be Aloy's latest trial.

Read more on Character Demo - "Aloy: Otherworldly Hunter" | Genshin Impact

item.title: "To manifest Eternity per the Almighty Shogun's will — that is what I aspire to."
item.description: Today we'd like to introduce you a general of the Tenryou Commission — Kujou Sara!
item.content:encoded:
Today we'd like to introduce you a general of the Tenryou Commission — Kujou Sara!

Read more on "To manifest Eternity per the Almighty Shogun's will — that is what I aspire to."

item.title: Character Demo - "Kujou Sara: Thunderous Devotion" | Genshin Impact
item.description: To ensure that the will of the Shogun will always be done, and to assist the Almighty Shogun in manifesting Eternity.
item.content:encoded:
To ensure that the will of the Shogun will always be done, and to assist the Almighty Shogun in manifesting Eternity.

item.title: Version 2.1 "Floating World Under the Moonlight" Update Notice
item.description: To ensure all Travelers have the best-possible Genshin Impact experience, our developers will soon begin performing update maintenance. After this is complete, the game will update to a new version.
item.content:encoded:
To ensure all Travelers have the best-possible Genshin Impact experience, our developers will soon begin performing update maintenance. After this is complete, the game will update to a new version.

Read more on Version 2.1 "Floating World Under the Moonlight" Update Notice

item.title: "Moonlight Merriment" Event: Take part and exchange for the event-exclusive claymore Luxurious Sea-Lord
item.description: During the event, Travelers can complete quests in Moonchase Tales or take part in Moonlight Seeker and Trail of Delicacies challenges to obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Crown of Insight, Primogems, recipes, and more.
item.content:encoded:
During the event, Travelers can complete quests in Moonchase Tales or take part in Moonlight Seeker and Trail of Delicacies challenges to obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Crown of Insight, Primogems, recipes, and more.

Read more on "Moonlight Merriment" Event: Take part and exchange for the event-exclusive claymore Luxurious Sea-Lord

item.title: "Hyakunin Ikki" Event: A team-switching combat challenge awaits
item.description: During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Ikki", Primogems, and more.
item.content:encoded:
During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Ikki", Primogems, and more.

Read more on "Hyakunin Ikki" Event: A team-switching combat challenge awaits

item.title: "Lunar Realm" Event: Go fishing and obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod!
item.description: During the event, join Inazuman fisherwoman Kujirai Momiji on her journey to chase the moon, in pursuit of a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." After completing a series of quests and challenges, you can obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, and other rewards.
item.content:encoded:
During the event, join Inazuman fisherwoman Kujirai Momiji on her journey to chase the moon, in pursuit of a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." After completing a series of quests and challenges, you can obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, and other rewards.

Read more on "Lunar Realm" Event: Go fishing and obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod!

item.title: Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and The Unforged (Claymore)！
item.description: Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!
item.content:encoded:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!

Read more on Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and The Unforged (Claymore)！

None

item.title: Paimon's Sneak Peek at Version 2.1 New Events - Phase I
item.description: Hello, Travelers~ Version 2.1 is just around the corner, is everyone ready for the new exciting events? Click the picture below for a quick overview~
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Character Demo - "Raiden Shogun: Judgment of Euthymia" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The sentimental cherry blossoms of days of yore have been stained with black. When thunder falls silent, the fleeting dream of an illusory bubble will be shattered.
item.content:encoded:
The sentimental cherry blossoms of days of yore have been stained with black. When thunder falls silent, the fleeting dream of an illusory bubble will be shattered.

Read more on Character Demo - "Raiden Shogun: Judgment of Euthymia" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Dear Travelers, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site
item.description: Due to technical reasons, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site on September 1, 2021 at 06:00 (UTC+8). It is expected to reopen on September 1, 2021 at 11:00 (UTC+8).
item.content:encoded:
Due to technical reasons, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site on September 1, 2021 at 06:00 (UTC+8). It is expected to reopen on September 1, 2021 at 11:00 (UTC+8).

Read more on Dear Travelers, we will temporarily close the Top-Up Center on Genshin Impact's official site

item.content:encoded:
Below are the details of the Version 2.1 update "Floating World Under the Moonlight" and the update compensation.

item.title: "Hyakunin Ikki" Gameplay Details
item.description: A free-for-all fighting tournament called Hyakunin Ikki is being held in an unknown guild hall near Inazuma City. Take part and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents and earning scores to win challenge rewards.
item.content:encoded:
A free-for-all fighting tournament called Hyakunin Ikki is being held in an unknown guild hall near Inazuma City. Take part and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents and earning scores to win challenge rewards.

Read more on "Hyakunin Ikki" Gameplay Details

item.title: Explanations of Version 2.1 Update Details
item.description: Hello, Travelers! Paimon heard that in the new Version 2.1, Travelers will have new islands to explore! Paimon wants to go with you, maybe we'll make new friends along the way~ Seems like there's a lot of new game content to experience. Are you ready? Let's go together!
item.content:encoded:
Hello, Travelers! Paimon heard that in the new Version 2.1, Travelers will have new islands to explore! Paimon wants to go with you, maybe we'll make new friends along the way~ Seems like there's a lot of new game content to experience. Are you ready? Let's go together!

Read more on Explanations of Version 2.1 Update Details

item.title: The “Side by Side We Venture” Web Event Has Begun~ Journey With Returning and New Adventurers to Win Prizes!
item.description: The Adventurers' Guild has issued limited-time special commissions: Travelers can join hands with returning and new adventurers to complete commissions to get rewards!
item.content:encoded:
The Adventurers' Guild has issued limited-time special commissions: Travelers can join hands with returning and new adventurers to complete commissions to get rewards!

Read more on The “Side by Side We Venture” Web Event Has Begun~ Journey With Returning and New Adventurers to Win Prizes!

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Raiden Shogun: Tranquil Thunder" | Genshin Impact
item.description: A brief, solitary bolt of lightning can turn into an unrelenting force of divine retribution in the hands of the Raiden Shogun. Perhaps by rejecting the illusory bubble of the mortal world can one become closer to eternity.
item.content:encoded:
A brief, solitary bolt of lightning can turn into an unrelenting force of divine retribution in the hands of the Raiden Shogun. Perhaps by rejecting the illusory bubble of the mortal world can one become closer to eternity.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Raiden Shogun: Tranquil Thunder" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Aloy: Mystical Glow of Frost" | Genshin Impact
item.description: "The hunter named Aloy had many identities in her original world..." Oh, it would be too boring if I started the story like that~! After all, I'm not a rigid old man, am I? Leave it to me to study this nimble girl from another world!
item.content:encoded:
"The hunter named Aloy had many identities in her original world..." Oh, it would be too boring if I started the story like that~! After all, I'm not a rigid old man, am I? Leave it to me to study this nimble girl from another world!

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Aloy: Mystical Glow of Frost" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Kujou Sara: Thunderstrike Feather" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The Crowfeather who came from the mountains and forests, turned into a swift Thunder Strike, steadfast to her mission of protecting Inazuma. A warrior who gives herself entirely to the land of Narukami, and devotes her body and soul by the will of the Shogun without any regrets.
item.content:encoded:
The Crowfeather who came from the mountains and forests, turned into a swift Thunder Strike, steadfast to her mission of protecting Inazuma. A warrior who gives herself entirely to the land of Narukami, and devotes her body and soul by the will of the Shogun without any regrets.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Kujou Sara: Thunderstrike Feather" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Story Teaser: Promise of a People's Dream | Genshin Impact
item.description: A nation that surges ahead has become stuck in a fleeting shadow of a moment. Perhaps only if time stands still will Inazuma truly shine eternal... Using her blade, she purged all obstacles to Inazuma's progress, making a promise of a beautiful vision of eternity to her subjects. Such is the singular will of the Raiden Shogun over the land of Narukami.
item.content:encoded:
A nation that surges ahead has become stuck in a fleeting shadow of a moment. Perhaps only if time stands still will Inazuma truly shine eternal... Using her blade, she purged all obstacles to Inazuma's progress, making a promise of a beautiful vision of eternity to her subjects. Such is the singular will of the Raiden Shogun over the land of Narukami.

Read more on Story Teaser: Promise of a People's Dream | Genshin Impact

item.title: "Lunar Realm" Gameplay Details
item.description: An Inazuman fisherwoman, Kujirai Momiji, has always wanted to catch a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." She plans to assemble all her old friends and embark on a journey to find it — and she invites you to join her. Will she attain her wish this time?
item.content:encoded:
An Inazuman fisherwoman, Kujirai Momiji, has always wanted to catch a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." She plans to assemble all her old friends and embark on a journey to find it — and she invites you to join her. Will she attain her wish this time?

Read more on "Lunar Realm" Gameplay Details

item.title: GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey (Teaser 2)
item.description: Genshin Impact, in collaboration with a South Korean pop music group, teamed up to deliver a one-of-a-kind performance in this teaser for the online concert.
item.content:encoded:
Genshin Impact, in collaboration with a South Korean pop music group, teamed up to deliver a one-of-a-kind performance in this teaser for the online concert.

Read more on GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey  (Teaser 2)

item.title: "To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship." — "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi
item.description: Hello Travelers~ Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island — Sangonomiya Kokomi.
item.content:encoded:
Hello Travelers~ Today, we'd like to introduce to you the Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island — Sangonomiya Kokomi.

Read more on "To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship." — "Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

item.title: Character Teaser - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Ocean's Will" | Genshin Impact
item.description: As the heir to the Sangonomiya line, she bears the responsibility of heeding the wishes of Watatsumi Island's people. Just as how the situation in battle can change a lot, so too can people's hearts. Faced with this, Kokomi knows that she has a long road ahead of her.
item.content:encoded:
As the heir to the Sangonomiya line, she bears the responsibility of heeding the wishes of Watatsumi Island's people. Just as how the situation in battle can change a lot, so too can people's hearts. Faced with this, Kokomi knows that she has a long road ahead of her.

Read more on Character Teaser - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Ocean's Will" | Genshin Impact

item.title: Teyvat Adventures Commemorative Video: Travel Anniversary Letter | Genshin Impact
item.description: We have come a long way, over mountains, across seas and rivers, listening to the various songs of nature. As the sun and moon rise and fall, all these moments will be part of a song of adventure that will remain in our hearts forever.
item.content:encoded:
We have come a long way, over mountains, across seas and rivers, listening to the various songs of nature. As the sun and moon rise and fall, all these moments will be part of a song of adventure that will remain in our hearts forever.

Read more on Teyvat Adventures Commemorative Video: Travel Anniversary Letter | Genshin Impact

item.description: Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use a Story Key to unlock Sangonomiya Kokomi's Story Quest Dracaena Somnolenta Chapter.

item.title: Character Demo - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: A Thousand Waves Under the Moon" | Genshin Impact
item.description: Finding the right time and place is difficult, but bringing people together is more valuable. If the power of all living beings came together, even the creatures of the deep sea can see the stars.
item.content:encoded:
Finding the right time and place is difficult, but bringing people together is more valuable. If the power of all living beings came together, even the creatures of the deep sea can see the stars.

item.title: Genshin Impact One Year Anniversary Community Event Rewards Preview
item.description: Time flies, a year has gone by, and Genshin Impact is about to turn one year old! Today, the Teyvat Hiking Association has brought you a rewards preview of the one year anniversary community events~
item.content:encoded:
Time flies, a year has gone by, and Genshin Impact is about to turn one year old! Today, the Teyvat Hiking Association has brought you a rewards preview of the one year anniversary community events~

item.description: The Inazuma OST Battle Theme MV "Duel in the Mist" is performed by special guest top Japanese folk musicians.
item.content:encoded:
The Inazuma OST Battle Theme MV "Duel in the Mist" is performed by special guest top Japanese folk musicians.

item.title: Collected Miscellany - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: Secret Tides of the Heart" | Genshin Impact
item.description: The scenery of Watatsumi Island is reflected on the surface of the sparkling waves, as is the pensive silhouette of Kokomi. Having a plan is not just for ensuring victory but also a way of defense. This is her duty as the Divine Priestess, and also Sangonomiya Kokomi's own determination.
item.content:encoded:
The scenery of Watatsumi Island is reflected on the surface of the sparkling waves, as is the pensive silhouette of Kokomi. Having a plan is not just for ensuring victory but also a way of defense. This is her duty as the Divine Priestess, and also Sangonomiya Kokomi's own determination.

Read more on Collected Miscellany - "Sangonomiya Kokomi: Secret Tides of the Heart" | Genshin Impact

item.description: Genshin Impact's Inazuma Chapter OST — "Realm of Tranquil Eternity" is out now.

item.title: "Travelers' Musings" — Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma | Genshin Impact
item.description: This video tells the story of the Inazuma OST's creative philosophy, and documents the one and a half month of remote collaboration across cultures and languages between the Chinese and Japanese teams.
item.content:encoded:
This video tells the story of the Inazuma OST's creative philosophy, and documents the one and a half month of remote collaboration across cultures and languages between the Chinese and Japanese teams.

Read more on "Travelers' Musings" — Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma | Genshin Impact

item.title: "Moonlight Merriment" Gameplay Details
item.description: The new event "Moonlight Merriment" is about to begin! The autumn moon shines bright, and Liyue Harbor is hard at work preparing for the traditional Moonchase Festival. The preparations for various activities based on the festival's theme are well underway.
item.content:encoded:
The new event "Moonlight Merriment" is about to begin! The autumn moon shines bright, and Liyue Harbor is hard at work preparing for the traditional Moonchase Festival. The preparations for various activities based on the festival's theme are well underway.

Read more on "Moonlight Merriment" Gameplay Details

item.title: GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 - Melodies of an Endless Journey (Teaser 3)
item.description: Talented musicians from around the world, including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.
item.content:encoded:
Talented musicians from around the world, including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.

item.title: Anniversary Web Event "An Unforgettable Journey" Now Online: Watch your own anniversary theater to obtain Primogems and other rewards
item.description: 365 days and nights have passed, and the curtain is about to rise on the Anniversary Theater dedicated to you... Travelers can watch their personalized Anniversary Theater on the event page. After watching during the event period, Travelers will receive a viewing gift.
item.content:encoded:
365 days and nights have passed, and the curtain is about to rise on the Anniversary Theater dedicated to you... Travelers can watch their personalized Anniversary Theater on the event page. After watching during the event period, Travelers will receive a viewing gift.

Read more on Anniversary Web Event "An Unforgettable Journey" Now Online: Watch your own anniversary theater to obtain Primogems and other rewards

item.title: Promotional Video - Together on a Long Journey | Genshin Impact
item.description: The first ray of sun shines on the horizon, while the stars sparkle brightly. We went on a long journey in Teyvat together, and now a new adventure awaits us.
item.content:encoded:
The first ray of sun shines on the horizon, while the stars sparkle brightly. We went on a long journey in Teyvat together, and now a new adventure awaits us.

Read more on Promotional Video - Together on a Long Journey | Genshin Impact

item.title: Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact
item.description: The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.
item.content:encoded:
The passing of time is marked by meals as we drink and make merry, blessed by nature's grace. From past to present, the years go by in the blink of an eye. Smoke of hearths brings us joy and domesticity paints a picture of everyday life. Delicate clouds chase the moon as the boat floats on the river of time.

Read more on Story Teaser: Flavors of the World | Genshin Impact

item.title: Version 2.2 "Into the Perilous Labyrinth of Fog" Trailer | Genshin Impact
item.description: The trials of the warriors are hidden in the domain, the sorrowful past buried in the hazy fog. When the veil of mystery is lifted, regardless if you are a martial artist craving for combat or a Traveler from a distant land, all will be revealed.
item.content:encoded:
The trials of the warriors are hidden in the domain, the sorrowful past buried in the hazy fog. When the veil of mystery is lifted, regardless if you are a martial artist craving for combat or a Traveler from a distant land, all will be revealed.
